message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $10500, given the product's value and our time invested in this negotiation. This is a fair price, considering your own evaluation of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $10500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10000. Can you consider that?
